name: Quorthon
description: '''Thomas Börje Forsberg''' (17 February 1966 – 3 June 2004), better known by the stage name '''Quorthon''', was a Swedish musician. He was one of the founders, as well as the sole songwriter, of the band [[Bathory (band)|Bathory]], which pioneered the [[black metal]] genre and is credited with creating the [[Viking metal]] style. A multi-instrumentalist, Quorthon wrote the music and lyrics on all of Bathory's albums and performed vocals and guitars.
